title: Patient Care Practical Skills Enhancement: Interactive Training for Improved Hygienic Food Handling and Personal Hygiene

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of Fundamental Food Safety and Hygiene Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain hygienic food handling procedures (washing, disinfection, storage) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform personal hygiene management methods (handwashing, glove use, etc.) with 100% accuracy in simulation videos.
Learners can identify hygiene management violations and propose improvement measures with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
